traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.desc: The crypt thing’s weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The crypt thing makes two attacks with its claws.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) slashing damage and 10 (3d6) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Teleport Other (1/day)
actions.desc: As an action, the crypt thing can teleport all creatures within 50 feet of it to a randomly determined location. A creature affected by the crypt thing’s Teleport Other must make a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw to avoid being teleported. An affected creature is teleported in a random direction and a random distance (1d10 x 100 feet) away from the crypt thing. Roll randomly for each creature that fails its saving throw. If the affected creature would arrive in a place already occupied by an object or another creature, the affected creature takes 14 (4d6) force damage and is not teleported.
